title: Monsters Among Us - Berserk Vol. 10 [Part 2] & Vol. 11
description:
Let's deep dive into #BERSERK! from Thousand Year Fiefdom to the Immortal Once Again!
This video will cover Berserk Deluxe Edition 4 - Volume 10 and Vol 11.
The chapters included are:
"Thousand Year Fiefdom", "Reunion in the Abyss", "A Way Through", "Bakiraka 1-2", "Flower of the Stone Castle" as well as "Devil Dogs 1-4", "Roar of the Wild Beast", "Forest of Tragedy", "Mortal Combat 1-2", "Armour to the Heart", "The Flying One", and "The Immortal Once Again".
